Description:
UNDER CONTRACT!
In the sought after Brookland Greens Estate sits this fantastic & modern family home. Surrounded by golf clubs and multiple recreational areas this is the faultless location for the family to get involved in activities.

Description:
Move In, Invest Or Develop?
Whether you are looking to occupy or invest, this classic family home on a block of approximately 594m2 is packed with potential. Walking distance to Camms Road shops, Monahans Road Reserve, Central Park, two primary schools, bus transport and Cranbourne Train Station, this fantastic location is combined with a large, flat rear yard to add an enticing opportunity for new development (STCA).
Offering a functional layout with easy care interiors, the home comprises of an open plan living and dining area, separate kitchen with servery, three bedrooms, a dual access family bathroom and laundry. Lovely timber style flooring, durable slate tiles, new carpets and crisp white walls create a fresh feeling home that is ready for owners or tenants to move straight into. The traditional kitchen features timber cabinetry, a gas cooktop, electric wall oven with separate grill and plenty of cupboard storage space. Bonus extras include a reverse cycle air conditioner, wall heater, ceiling fans, downlights and NBN connectivity.
Outside, a pergola entertainment area, handy storage shed and carport add practicality and family appeal whilst the large grassed yard offers a blank canvas packed with possibilities; design a garden paradise, grow your own fruit and veggies, install a swimming pool for summer, extend the home or achieve your property development dreams (STCA) – the choice is yours!
Walking distance to schools, shops, parks and public transport as well as only minutes to Cranbourne Shopping Centre, Thompsons Parkway Shopping Centre, Cranbourne Racecourse and the South Gippsland Highway, this fabulous family home is the perfect opportunity for first home buyers, families, investors or the focused developer.
Call us today for more information, inspection details or to make an early offer!

THE HIDDEN GEM OF CRANBOURNE!
CRANBOURNE, Park Avenue Estate: Nestled in a quiet and friendly neighbourhood is this mesmerising home which spells luxury, class and convenienceall under one roof! It is set on a sprawling 601 sqm approx.. landblock, a Corner block of a serene court and in the middle of all the facilities and amenities any family could ask for.
The captivating house comprises 4 very good sized bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. The Master is sure to make your heart skip a beattalk the ample space, the solid timber floors, the full ensuite with double vanities/double showers and the WIR! The other bedrooms are equally spacious to provide space and comfort for each member of the family.
Step into the world of grace and charm this lovely home oozesthere are 3 separate living areas (The Formal Lounge, The Family Living, Rumpus, along with the dining space)! Solid timber floors to the first two and carpet to the back bedrooms.

Description:
SOLD AT AUCTION BY PETER KHAMIS
CRANBOURNE-BROOKLAND GREENS ESTATE
Upon on arrival ...you'll notice that this home may require a little polish. Apart from that this Carlisle built home is a home that never stops giving pure enjoyment, every design is well thought out for easy living.
Sitting on over 1/4 an acre in the ever prestigious Brookland Greens Estate, having tranquil living and convenience all in one. All amenities are close by including shopping centres, schools, parks, freeway access and public transport.
Downstairs has a large open study, powder room, multiple living rooms including a generous rumpus that is definitely large enough to place a billiard table. Upstairs you will find all 5 bedrooms including the large master with its own balcony and hotel like ensuite.
The kitchen is monstrous in many ways complete with dishwasher, caesar stone bench tops, soft close drawers, upright stove/oven, walk in pantry and a fridge cavity to add in the largest of fridges.
Stepping outside you will find the inground fiberglass pool which is salt chlorinated and solar heated. The enormous backyard also allows extra garaging or shedding to be built (STCA).
Car accommodation is a plenty with a garage holding 4 cars and side access to bring through boats and caravans.
A truly remarkable home on an abundance of land that will be highly sought after. Just the perfect time to buy with Summer upon us.
